Detailed Description

Utility class for making debit strings.

Member Function Documentation

bool DebitMaking::makeProximityDebit (  char *  operation,
const SearchResultRequest *  searchReq,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
const char *const   searchString,
const MC2Coordinate &  coord,
uint32  distance
)  [static]
 

Make debiting information for one proximity serach.

Parameters:
operation The string to print the debiting into, must be 256 long.
searchReq The SearchResultRequest to debit for.
params The search params used.
searchString The searchString in the ProximityRequest. NULL if searchString was not used in search.
coord The center coordinate.
distance The distance from the centerpoint searched.
Returns:
True if debit string filled ok, false if not.

bool DebitMaking::makeProximityDebit (  char *  operation,
ProximityRequest *  inReq,
PacketContainer *  ansCont,
const char *const   searchString,
int32  lat,
int32  lon,
uint32  distance
)  [static]
 

Make debiting information for one proximity serach.

Parameters:
operation The string to print the debiting into, must be 256 long.
inReq The ProximityRequest to debit for.
ansCont The answer PacketContainer with a VanillaSearchReply or a ProximityReply.
searchString The searchString in the ProximityRequest. NULL if searchString was not used in search.
lat The latitude of the centerpoint in the circle proximity area.
lon The longitude of the centerpoint in the circle proximity area.
distance The distance from the centerpoint searched.
Returns:
True if debit string filled ok, false if not.

bool DebitMaking::makeRouteDebit (  char *  operation,
RouteRequest *  inReq,
uint32  rerouteID = 0,
uint32  rerouteCreateTime = 0,
uint32  rerouteReason = 0
)  [static]
 

Make debiting information for one route.

Using Using RouteRequests valid-orig/-dest to identify origin and destination.

Parameters:
operation The string to print the debiting into, must be 256 long.
inReq The RouteRequest to debit for.
rerouteID The routeID that this route is a re-route for.
rerouteCreateTime The route create time that this route is a re-route for.
Returns:
True if debit string filled ok, false if not.

bool DebitMaking::makeRouteDebit (  char *  operation,
RouteRequest *  inReq,
uint32  nbrRouteItems,
RouteItem **  theRouteItems,
uint32  rerouteID = 0,
uint32  rerouteCreateTime = 0,
uint32  rerouteReason = 0
)  [static]
 

Make debiting information for one route.

Using Using RouteItem to identify origin and destination.

Parameters:
operation The string to print the debiting into, must be 256 long.
inReq The RouteRequest to debit for.
nbrRouteItems The number of RouteItems.
theRouteItems The RouteItems.
rerouteID The routeID that this route is a re-route for.
rerouteCreateTime The route create time that this route is a re-route for.
Returns:
True if debit string filled ok, false if not.

RouteRequest *  inReq,
const VanillaMatch *const   originVM,
const VanillaMatch *const   destinationVM,
uint32  rerouteID = 0,
uint32  rerouteCreateTime = 0,
uint32  rerouteReason = 0
)  [static]
 

Make debiting information for one route.

Using VanillaMatch to identify origin and destination.

Parameters:
operation The string to print the debiting into, must be 256 long.
inReq The RouteRequest to debit for.
originVM The origin of the route.
destinationVM The destination of the route.
rerouteID The routeID that this route is a re-route for.
rerouteCreateTime The route create time that this route is a re-route for.
Returns:
True if debit string filled ok, false if not.

bool DebitMaking::makeSearchDebit (  char *  operation,
SearchResultRequest *  inReq,
const char *const   locationString,
const char *const   searchString,
const char *  extraString = NULL
)  [static]
 

Make debiting information for one search.

Parameters:
operation The string to print the debiting into, must be 256 long.
inReq The SearchRequest to debit for.
locationString The location searched for in SearchRequest.
searchString The searchString in the SearchRequest.
Returns:
True if debit string filled ok, false if not.
